name: Bootstrap Island
description:
As the sole survivor of a shipwreck in the 17th century, you must quickly learn to adapt and survive on a mysterious and ruthless island filled with deadly threats and secrets to explore.

Key Features:


  • A ruthless roguelike experience with short intense sessions. No hand-holding, survive as best you can;
  • Progression system. Surviving longer, unlocks new resources and improves further changes;
  • Randomized resources and consequence-based outcomes to your decisions. Every player will have their unique experience;
  • Dynamic open world game featuring realistic, simulated physics and systems-based gameplay. Day and night, fire, liquid, etc., all with a direct impact on gameplay);
  • A captivating narrative, set in a 17th century storybook atmosphere. The story changes according to the player`s progress and decisions.



Bootstrap Island is the most realistic survival adventure you can experience without putting your life in danger!




Co-funded by European Union Creative Europe Media.
